ns2:version.ns2:label: Ministry of Forestry Data
ns2:version.ns2:description: Single data structure and forms used by Indonesia MOFOR

ns2:item.ns2:label: Rolling land, amplitude up to 50 m
Heavy damage, tree will not survice
Straight and clean without damage, cross section circular, apparently sound
Similar to 1 but up to half of surface knotty, or cross section irregular, or slight sweep
Twisted and knotty, or with other defects which reduce the usable volume by up to one quarter, such as rot, burn, physical damage, forks or bend
Very knotty and bent, or with defects which reduce the usable volume by one quarter to half
Rejects, with such defects that only less than half of the volume could be used

ns2:number.name: northing
ns2:number.ns2:label: S-N
ns2:number.ns2:description: Valid UTM northing between 0 and 750 or between 8670 and 9999

ns2:check.ns2:message: The northing value must be between 0 and 750 or between 8670 and 9999

ns2:compare.ns2:message: This field must be either 1 or blank
This field must be either 1 or blank
This field must be greater than 1
